attributes.action: Stop the war in Iraq (Bring lovejoy back to Soccer Am)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop the War in iraq, and whilst soving this if anyone knows how to bring lovejoy back to soccer am, you sign this form!





Tim Lovejoy has been stolen from Soccer Am and has to returned without question. Gordon Brown, I have paid my council tax and Sky subscription for 2 years now and I feel I have paid the right to have this man present my Saturday morning TV!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
